info.name: Customizable Appearance
info.description:
⧸ Style for www.eldarya.fr ⧸
Master-list of Helpful Links:
  • Physical items
  • Clothes items
  • Familiars
  • Sprites
These Options are just the bare minimum so you aren't overwhelmed. There's plenty for you to play with in the style! = )
Important If you're having difficulties, please consult the FAQ section below before you leave negative feedback.

Advance Setting Notes:
* Case sensitive.
** For this, only the # is needed.
info.additionalInfo:
Difficulties? FAQ:

  • There are items separated from my avatar! by Ольга Мельникова, ailsaria, and Crazy Owl
    • I can only think of two reasons this would happen.
    1. If you have original images, make sure they're aligned with everything before using them. You can use this as a base to align your customs with any image editing software that supports transparency and layers.
    2. If the items in question are official links, just pay attention to the descriptors in them. If it has /web_portrait/ or /icon/ in it, change it to /web_full/, and you should be good.
  • What do I do if I have a image that's only portrait size? by no one... yet
    • Go to edit the style and insert 0%/30em after the URL, and that should size it down to the /web_full/ equivalent.
  • Is there a My Candy Love/Amour Sucré version of this? by Gosia Bigaj
    • Yup! One for your Candy and your school id: Customizable Appearance and Customizable ID Photo.
  • What if I only want to modify one item? by Karunakku for Customizable Appearance (MCL)
    • I'm sorry, but this just layers a ton of images over each other to create a full picture. Due to how they handle the avatars, this is the only method I can use at the moment. If I ever found an easier way to do this, I'd let everyone know in a heartbeat.
  • what value talking about ? by she s nivin
    • you mean the popup when you want to upload it? (happened to me once) you have to put something in every box that you choose cause it can't be left "empty"
    - by Natalie Snape.
Sites Supported: ☑ http://www.eldarya.fr/ ☑ http://www.eldarya.com/ ☑ http://www.eldarya.ru/ ☑ http://www.eldarya.pl/ ☑ http://www.eldarya.it/ ☑ http://www.eldarya.hu/ ☑ http://www.eldarya.fi/ ☑ http://www.eldarya.es/ ☑ http://www.eldarya.de/ ☑ http://www.eldarya.com.br/

Change Log

  1. Patch 1.1.4
    • Fixed regexp.
  2. Options 1.1.3
    • Improved segment for header avatar.
    • Added four new options in the advance settings. Note to those updating from 1.1.1.
  3. Patch 1.1.1
    • Some minor improvements and fixed bugs.
  4. Userstyle's Misstep 1.1
    • CSS restored. Will hopefully stay this way.
    • Some minor improvements and fixed bugs.
  5. Patch 1.0.4
    • Fixed minor bug that change other users bg and familiars.
    • Added the option for head accessories.
  6. Advance Settings 1.0.2
    • Added option for style settings for more than one companion.
    • Simpler options for style settings for companions.
  7. Advance Settings 1.0.1
    • Simplified options for familiars. Note.
    • Now effects top header picture.
    • Now using a different method to re-size familiars. Note to those updating from 0.9.2.
    • Now able to re-size your companion through the settings. Note to those updating from 0.9.2.
  8. Initial Release 0.9.3
    • New Links.
    • Added segment for pet/familiar.

DISCLAIMER

Just for fair warning.
  1. This style was created in google chrome, as it's my browser of choice. Whether or not this style is compatible with other browsers is a mystery to me.
  2. My overall knowledge of coding is limited — this is just a hobby I picked up recently — so most of my styles are created by trail and error.
With that all in mind, I hope you can all be patient with me, I assure you, I am doing my best!

options.label: Enable
